data.actual_result: The timer bar stops moving until you stop typing.
data.expected_result: The timer bar should continue to decrease.
data.short_description: While typing a mention, the timer bar for in-app notification freezes. (and goes to correct position when you stop.)
data.steps_to_repro: - Receive an in-app notification - Start typing a mention - Continue typing (ensure you are pressing letters quick enough) - Observe the blue timer bar on in-app notification
